# f5xc_data_group (Resource)

Manages a DataGroup in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the DataGroup.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the DataGroup will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the DataGroup.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the DataGroup.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the DataGroup.
